summary: A test suite that validates EC2 resource tagging operations using mocked AWS services. It includes helpers for creating resources with tags, retrieving and filtering tags, and a collection of test cases covering tag creation, deletion, retrieval, wildcard filtering, special characters, empty resources, and tag limit enforcement across instances, volumes, and snapshots.
business_intent: To ensure reliable management of AWS EC2 tags, supporting accurate resource identification, cost allocation, and compliance by verifying that tagging APIs behave correctly under various scenarios.
